description: Episode of Series "Beyond 2000". A "Beyond 2000", joint B.B.C. production which gives an overview of the problems associated with the Greenhouse Effect. A series of small episodes which clearly explains what the Greenhouse Effect is and its impact on the earth both now and in the future. The programs also discuss stategies and plans that may help turn around the environmental exploitation of our finite resources.
